response.overview: The greatest emperor of the Qing Dynasty, Chen Long, started his campaign against the Muslims who peacefully resided in the Southeast Desert in China. While preparing his magnificent troops, he sent secret agents like Leonard and John to seize the Quran in hope that he could bring Chief Mohammed to submission without a war. Jacky, leader of the Red Flower rebels, which sought to overthrow the Manchurian regime and restore Chinese reign, came to Princess Miriam with his noble character and invincible kung-fu.
response.title: The Unconquered
